channel.title: whonix clipboard with the host system
channel.description: Hello, whonix has started sharing the clipboard with the host system, although it didn't do it before. As far as I remember, this is not entirely secure, since host and vm whonix communicate. Would this be a potential security hole? or everything is fine? win host, communicate through google translator :smiley:

item.title: whonix clipboard with the host system
item.dc:creator: Bobby
item.description:
I updated the virtual box, perhaps because of this they have changed. The manual helped to solve the problem, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: whonix clipboard with the host system
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There shouldn’t be anything new about the behavior in a long time.

See:
https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/VirtualBox/Guest_Additions#Clipboard_Sharing

Host -> Whonix-Gateway clipboard sharing enable by default? Development
We had another lengthy discussion on this but I can’t find it anymore.
Bobby:

win host

Windows Hosts

Read full topic
